review_1: First consideration:this game is a project under development...therefore still plenty of things to implement! You will find the road map on the web site therefore you must try to image what this game could become! The basis of the game are rock solid! It's an open world where you literally travel with your spaceship from one planet to another....and then explore. You can make money transporting goods or hunting people...but watch out to the police! Therefore the way to develop the game are pretty much infinite. The developer is really friendly and open to any suggestion. Just give him time..there are a lot of ideas for the future..imho this game will become amazing..Also updates are quite frequent. For the current price...I think it's really an investment...if you like open word games.

review_5: Even with it's very unfinished look and feel, this game has brought me a higher level of immersion than 90% of the VR games I've played out there. I feel it is mainly because this game was developed with excellent fundamentals from the interactions, to the worlds that truly feel alive and busy with life (even with 0 voicelines!) I've only spent a couple hours playing so far, but every time I took my headset off it felt like waking up from a different life. Though not exactly comparable, the last time a VR game made me feel like this was Skyrim VR.
